item.title:
Patti LuPone says she is not familiar with the MCU despite starring in the upcoming show ‘AGATHA: COVEN OF CHAOS.’
“I'm still not familiar with it. I had to watch WandaVision twice to figure it out.”
http://bit.ly/428fhlO

item.title:
Robert Pattinson’s upcoming projects:
• ‘Mickey17’ dir. Bong Joon-ho (March 2024)
• ‘The Batman - Part II’ dir. Matt Reeves (October 2025)
• ‘Average Height, Average Build’ dir. Adam McKay (TBD)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Robert Downey Jr. will play a retired cop opposite Robert Pattinson’s serial killer in Adam McKay’s ‘AVERAGE HEIGHT, AVERAGE BUILD.’
The cop won’t give up on the murders despite his retirement, and the killer tries to prevent him from following his trail.
item.author: FilmUpdates
